explains: v. 疏于照顾，未予看管；不予重视，忽视；漏做
n. 忽略，忽视，未被重视
wordGroup: neglect of duty 玩忽职守；[法]失职；过失责任

sentences.en: The place smelled of decay and neglect.
sentences.cn: 这地方有一股污浊腐朽的气味。

sentences.en: All too often the animals die through neglect.
sentences.cn: 动物因缺乏照料而死亡的事司空见惯。

sentences.en: The buildings are crumbling from years of neglect.
sentences.cn: 由于多年无人维修，这些建筑物行将倒塌。
